column1: Legal Full Name (as it appears on your birth certificate or passport)
column14: What is your preferred language for theological study?
column15: What is your highest level of completed education?
column16: Are you currently enrolled in any other academic or theological programs?
column18: Are there any special accommodations that will be needed during the program?
column19: Have you ever been convicted for any criminal offenses? (Your answer will not necessarily disqualify you from the program or from a scholarship.)
column21: Your current role within your church
column22: If you are a lead pastor, how many congregation members does your church currently have? (Note: only include congregation members ages 18 and up)
column23: With which denomination is your church affiliated?
column25: How many years have you been affiliated with your church?
column26: What ministry experience do you currently have (pastoral, missions, teaching, youth, worship, etc.)?
column27: How long have you been a believer?
column28: Do you believe the Bible is the infallible Word of God? (Yes/No with explanation)
column29: Are there any teachings/doctrines you currently struggle with or are seeking clarity on?
column30: Please paste a Statement of Purpose (minimum 150 words) demonstrating your commitment to studying through the duration of the program along with your goals and purpose for studying with CCBI.
column31: How do you hope to use your theological education to impact your church, community or nation?
column32: Are you available for the full duration of the program, including assignments and exams?
column33: Do you have reliable Internet access?
column34: Do you have access to a quiet, private space for studying?
column35: How and through whom/what did you hear about us (Please be specific)?
column36: Do you know anyone currently studying at CCBI?
